description: The prison cells within the G-8 Marine Base where captured pirates are held and interrogated. This is where Zoro is imprisoned after being captured by the Marines.

keyEvents.title: Zoro Taken to Prison
keyEvents.description: Zoro is escorted to the prison cells where Vice Admiral Jonathan orders his interrogation.

keyEvents.title: Zoro's Interrogation
keyEvents.description: Lieutenant Commander Drake interrogates Zoro about the Straw Hats' infiltration methods.
keyEvents.significance: Demonstrates Marine intelligence gathering and provides comedy.

statusHistory.reason: Prison is operational during the G-8 arc

description: The medical facility within the G-8 Marine Base where injured Marines receive treatment. This becomes the primary location for Chopper and Nami's storyline in this episode.

keyEvents.title: Dr. Kobato's Debut
keyEvents.description: Dr. Kobato appears in the medical wing as the only available doctor.
keyEvents.significance: Introduces the setting where Chopper will showcase his medical skills.

keyEvents.title: Chopper Enters Medical Wing
keyEvents.description: Chopper is smuggled into the medical wing hidden in a box of medical supplies.
keyEvents.significance: Brings Chopper to the location where he can help injured Marines.

keyEvents.title: Chopper Performs Surgery
keyEvents.description: Chopper disguises himself and performs emergency surgeries on wounded Marines.
keyEvents.significance: Demonstrates Chopper's medical expertise and compassion.

keyEvents.title: Nami Assists as Nurse
keyEvents.description: Nami arrives in a nurse uniform to assist with the medical emergency.
keyEvents.significance: Shows Straw Hat teamwork under pressure.

keyEvents.title: Dr. Kobato Protects Chopper
keyEvents.description: Dr. Kobato forbids Drake from entering the medical wing to investigate.
keyEvents.significance: Shows Dr. Kobato's gratitude and character growth.

statusHistory.reason: Medical wing is operational during the G-8 arc

description: The main kitchen of the G-8 Marine Base where Jessica works as the head chef. Luffy and Sanji work here undercover as marine cooks.

keyEvents.title: Onion Cutting Task
keyEvents.description: Jessica assigns Luffy and Sanji to cut three hundred onions, but both struggle with the task.
keyEvents.significance: Provides comic relief and shows the Straw Hats maintaining their cover.

statusHistory.reason: Kitchen is operational during the G-8 arc

description: A heavily fortified Marine base built on Navarone Island, commanded by Vice Admiral Jonathan. The Straw Hats accidentally fell into this base after leaving Skypiea.

statusHistory.reason: Marine base is operational during the G-8 arc
